Title: The Revolution of the Seven Madmen
Writer: Mirta Arlt, Roberto Arlt (novels), Beatriz Guido, Luis Pico Estrada, Leopoldo Torre Nilsson
Actors: Alfredo Alcón, Norma Aleandro, Héctor Alterio, Thelma Biral
Plot: After committing a fraud in the company where he works, a man meets a strange character who will introduce you to a group a terrorist attack plot.
